name: The Song of Seven : Overture
description: Take a boy and a girl on a journey of enlightenment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit only) Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 465 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Analise de The Song of Seven: Chapter One. (Brazilian Portuguese) Review of The Song of Seven: Chapter One.(English one - A bit below)   Resumo
awesome little game with a ton of character and beautiful world building. looking forward to what the next chapter has to offer!

The game is silent - no music, and most importantly - no voices. That makes the game blunt. It also runs awfully, controlls are terrible, confusing and a nightmare for point&click adventure gamer (tried to play w/ keyboard). Can't say anything about the story and characters because couldn't endure more than 20 min. I never write reviews but this game was such a dissapointment!
